roleset.name: cause shame, feeling self consciousness or shame

example.name: nice easy transitive
example.text: But State Department officials accuse Israel of leaking questionable claims to embarrass the U.S.

example.name: passivized
example.text: Conservatives , embarrassed by Republican influence - peddling scandals at the Department of Housing and Urban Development , have used the issue in an effort to shift blame onto a Democratic - controlled Congress .

propbank.arg: by Republican influence - peddling scandals at the Department of Housing and Urban Development

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: I had bragged about you to Titus , and you did n't embarrass me .

example.name: adjectival: progressive
example.text: Two such actions , both filed earlier this year in Georgia state court in Atlanta , could be particularly embarrassing to the industry : both name J. Chandler Peterson , an Atlanta financial planner who is a founder and past chairman of the IAFP , as defendant .

propbank.arg: Two such actions , both filed earlier this year in Georgia state court in Atlanta

example.name: adjectival: different preposition
example.text: Lincoln 's treatment by former thrift regulators , in an agency disbanded by the new law , has proved embarrassing for five senators who received thousands of dollars in campaign contributions from Mr. Keating .

propbank.arg: Lincoln 's treatment by former thrift regulators , in an agency disbanded by the new law
for five senators who received thousands of dollars in campaign contributions from Mr. Keating

example.name: adjectival: passive
example.text: People are too embarrassed to say they have n't done anything . ''

propbank.arg: to say they have n't done anything

example.name: arg 0 and argMs
example.text: I have seen him on several occasions give answers which show that he has no real understanding of the underlying issue at all , and several of which are really just embarrassing .

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Bogart was " embarrassing " with his over - acted insanity

example.name: empty it, args 0,1
example.text: While not publicly embarrassing , it was embarrassing to me that I had to go climb a tree to get away .

propbank.arg: that I had to go climb a tree to get away

roleset.note: EMBARRASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'embarrass' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'embarrassed' based on BOLT-7. Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet entry Experiencer obj. (from embarrass.01-v)
EMBARRASSED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from embarrassed.01-j)
EMBARRASSING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, embarrass-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1. (from embarrassing.01-j)
